mapper.sql: tpds_merchant_cer_id, merchant_no, pub_key, pri_key, cer_path, create_time, update_time, update_user, note
mapper.update: update tpds_merchant_cer set merchant_no = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pub_key = #{pubKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pri_key = #{priKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cer_path = #{cerPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tpds_merchant_cer_id = #{tpdsMerchantCerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tpds_merchant_cer_id, merchant_no, pub_key, pri_key, cer_path, create_time, update_time, update_user, note from tpds_merchant_cer
